Bash(" would fail because string comparison "t h" === token
never matched individual phoneme tokens.

Major changes:
- Update Rule interface to use string[] for all fields
- Parser converts space-separated strings to arrays during rule creation
- Engine matches context sequences by iterating through arrays
- Reverser updated for array-based context matching
- Phoneme extractor works directly with arrays
- All 124 tests updated and passing \(added 5 new multi-phoneme tests\)

Examples now working:
- Multi-phoneme contexts: a > b / t h _;
- Both sides: a > b / c d _ e f;
- Word boundaries: t h > θ / # _;
- Sequences: a j > e;

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
